channel.title: Getting Started on DNS Proxy Server
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on DNS Proxy Server

item.title: Release Version Control
item.description: DPS Versioning DPS uses semantic versioning [2] for releasing. The latest stable version is the one which is marked as “latest” label at Github releases or the latest docker tag. Click here to see the binary releases at Github. Promotion to the latest (Stable) Minor pre-releases with at least 1 month since they released without a confirmed bug issued on the Github oficial repo, will be released as the latest.
